thread.title: Dennis Thompson - BEAMS Freelance Photography
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Dennis Thompson - BEAMS Freelance Photography

author: Dennis Thompson - BEAMS Freelance Photography
title: Dennis Thompson - BEAMS Freelance Photography
text: B&H Photo-Video has a great reputation for great quality products, fast delivery and impeccable dependability. I have lived and photographed all over the world and have ordered and received the necessary supplied to do this from B&H Photo-Video. They have always delivered what I ordered on time and in excellent condition not matter how remote or obscure my location. They are just the best. Sometimes you might think you can get a better price elsewhere but it always comes back to bite you because B&H has not hidden fees or gimmicks in their price. Best to go with B&H. Thank you.
